title: Elvis Kurt Russell 1979
description:
This is the 1979 movie called "Elvis the Movie" starring Kurt Russell and directed by John Carpenter. This version is not the same as the other one floating out there on Bittorrent. The other one&#039;s audio is very out of sync, and currently has no seeders (stuck at 99%). 

This file is not perfect DVD quality, but it came from a relatively good VHS copy, so it&#039;s a slight improvement on what&#039;s out there. 

This movie is in English, and has no subtitles or DVD extras, it is only the movie. 

Runs approx. 117 mins. 

This is the IMDB link: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0079103/ 

And here is a link to a page about the attempt to get this released on dVD (includes a petition, please sign): Visit http://members.tripod.com/~evilbaby/Elvis.html
